mainText:
Dear Steve in Heaven
God created the world and gave us Steve Jobs. I may have not known you  
at personal level, but have come to cherish the works of yours hands,  
soul and spirit. You made Africa develop in communication, so fast  
that Kenya is now compared to any other developed country in the world  
in terms of communication.
My Dear God, Thank You for Giving us Steve Jobs.
RIP our Steve Jobs, for I shall always appreciate you.


Kind Regards.
author: Joseph
